name: Memory Coach: Blocks
description:
Memory Coach: Blocks

Exercise your memory with this android game!

This is a classic Memory Blocks game for training your memory.
You can choose a set of pictures: funny birds, strict masks or pretty patterns.
Depending on your preparation, you can choose the size of the playing field: from small for beginners to gigantic for players with super memory.

Compare your time completing the level in the high scores table! 
Take first place!
